content_chunks.title: Who is Timothy Kanda
content_chunks.content: Timothy Kanda is a Graduate Software Developer in Sydney, Australia. Master of IT (Software Development) from Swinburne University, September 2025. Seeking Graduate Developer, Junior Full-Stack, or Backend Developer roles.

content_chunks.title: Key Strengths
content_chunks.content: Key Strengths: Problem-solving, System design thinking, Data quality awareness, Clear communication, Trade-off judgment, Scalability decisions.

content_chunks.title: Masters Degree Details
content_chunks.content: Master of Information Technology (Software Development), Swinburne University of Technology, Sydney. Completed September 2025. Key subjects: Software Engineering Principles, Database Systems, Cloud Computing, Agile Methodologies, Web Development, Data Structures & Algorithms, IT Project Management.

content_chunks.title: University Coursework Details
content_chunks.content: University Courses Completed: (1) Software Engineering - SDLC, design patterns, testing strategies, code quality. (2) Database Systems - SQL, normalization, query optimization, PostgreSQL. (3) Cloud Computing - AWS services, deployment, scalability. (4) Web Development - HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React fundamentals. (5) Agile Methodologies - Scrum, sprints, user stories, retrospectives. (6) Data Structures & Algorithms - Arrays, trees, graphs, sorting, Big-O analysis. (7) IT Project Management - Planning, risk management, stakeholder communication.

content_chunks.title: AusBiz Internship Experience
content_chunks.content: Full Stack Developer Intern at Employability Advantage × AusBiz Consulting (April-July 2025). Tech stack: Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, PostgreSQL, NextAuth.js, AWS. Built AI Participation Management System. Used React for dashboards, Node.js for APIs, PostgreSQL for data storage, AWS for deployment.

content_chunks.title: STAR Example: Problem Solving at AusBiz
content_chunks.content: STAR Example - Problem Solving: SITUATION: Student allocation system had manual CSV matching taking 20+ hours/week with 40% error rate. TASK: Design automated matching system with accuracy validation. ACTION: Built deterministic matching for exact student IDs, fuzzy matching (Levenshtein distance) for name variations, human-in-the-loop confirmation for edge cases. Used TypeScript, Prisma ORM, PostgreSQL. RESULT: Reduced manual work by 20 hours/week, achieved 90% automation rate, improved accuracy to 99%.

content_chunks.title: STAR Example: System Design at AusBiz
content_chunks.content: STAR Example - System Design: SITUATION: Compliance reporting required audit trail for all allocation decisions. TASK: Design system that maintains data integrity for auditors. ACTION: Implemented append-only event sourcing pattern, created immutable audit logs with timestamps and user IDs, built compliance dashboard with filtering and export. Used PostgreSQL triggers and Next.js API routes. RESULT: Passed compliance review, 99.9% uptime, audit-safe workflow approved by stakeholders.

content_chunks.title: Kenyan Diaspora Media Experience
content_chunks.content: Website Manager & Web Developer at The Kenyan Diaspora Media (March 2022-Present). Tech stack: WordPress, PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript. Built custom plugins for content management. Maintained production site serving diaspora community.

content_chunks.title: STAR Example: WordPress Challenge
content_chunks.content: STAR Example - WordPress: SITUATION: Non-technical editors struggled with complex WordPress admin, causing content delays. TASK: Simplify content workflow for editors without coding knowledge. ACTION: Developed custom WordPress plugin with simplified dashboard, drag-drop content blocks, and preview functionality. Used PHP hooks, JavaScript, custom post types. RESULT: Reduced content publishing time by 50%, zero training required for new editors, increased publishing frequency by 3x.

content_chunks.title: Kipdev Internship Experience
content_chunks.content: Web Developer Intern at Kipdev WP Solutions (March-October 2022). Tech stack: WordPress, PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3. Built user registration/authentication systems. Worked on full web development lifecycle from requirements to deployment.

content_chunks.title: AI Participation Management System
content_chunks.content: Project: AI Participation Management System. Tech: Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, PostgreSQL, NextAuth.js, AWS, OpenAI API. Features: CSV enrollment import, deterministic/fuzzy matching, human-in-the-loop confirmation, compliance dashboards, audit-safe workflows. Impact: 20 hours/week saved, 90% admin automation, 85% allocation satisfaction, 99.9% uptime.

content_chunks.title: Digital Twin Portfolio Project
content_chunks.content: Project: AI Digital Twin Portfolio. Tech: Next.js, TypeScript, Upstash Vector, Groq LLaMA, MCP Protocol. Features: RAG-based semantic search, vector embeddings for professional data, MCP server for Claude Desktop integration. Demonstrates: AI integration, modern web architecture, production deployment.

content_chunks.title: Next.js Experience
content_chunks.content: Next.js Experience: Used in AI Participation Management System (AusBiz internship) and Digital Twin Portfolio. App Router, SSR, API routes, server actions. 6 months production experience.

content_chunks.title: TypeScript Experience
content_chunks.content: TypeScript Experience: Used in all projects at AusBiz internship. Strict type safety, interfaces for API contracts, Prisma type generation. 6 months production experience.

content_chunks.title: PostgreSQL Experience
content_chunks.content: PostgreSQL Experience: Used in AI Participation Management System. Schema design, Prisma ORM integration, migrations, query optimization. Learned in Database Systems course at university.

content_chunks.title: AWS Experience
content_chunks.content: AWS Experience: Used EC2, S3, RDS, Amplify for deployment at AusBiz. CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure. Learned in Cloud Computing course at university and AWS Bootcamp.

content_chunks.title: WordPress Experience
content_chunks.content: WordPress Experience: 3+ years at Kenyan Diaspora Media and Kipdev. Custom plugin development, PHP hooks, theme customization, MySQL database management. Built user authentication systems and CMS workflows.

content_chunks.title: HTML5 Experience
content_chunks.content: HTML5 Experience: Used across all web projects since 2022. Semantic markup, accessibility, responsive design. Applied in WordPress themes, React components, and static sites. Learned in Web Development course and eMobilis bootcamp.

content_chunks.title: React Experience
content_chunks.content: React Experience: Used in AI Participation Management System and Digital Twin. Functional components, hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext), component libraries (shadcn/ui). 6 months production experience.

content_chunks.title: Certifications and Training
content_chunks.content: Certifications: (1) 10-Week Full Stack Developer Internship - Employability Advantage × AusBiz Consulting, 2025. (2) Full-Stack with AWS Cloud Bootcamp - AusBiz Consulting, 2024. (3) Web Development Program - eMobilis Institute (Mastercard Foundation Scholarship), 2022.

content_chunks.title: Contact Information
content_chunks.content: Contact: Email tmthkanda@gmail.com, Phone +61 435 426 947, GitHub github.com/timkanda, LinkedIn linkedin.com/in/timothy-kanda-aaa190b4. Location: Sydney, NSW, Australia. Work authorization: Australian Work Rights.

content_chunks.title: Key Metrics and Numbers
content_chunks.content: Key Metrics: 20 hours/week manual work reduction, 90% admin task automation, 85% allocation satisfaction improvement, 99.9% system uptime, 3+ years WordPress experience, 6 months Next.js production experience, Master's degree completed September 2025.

content_chunks.title: Why Hire Timothy
content_chunks.content: Why hire Timothy: Combines Master's degree education with production experience. Delivered 20 hours/week efficiency gain at internship. Modern tech stack (Next.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, AWS). AI integration experience. Quick learner, clear communicator.
